mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vol_apply (member_id, act_id, appl_name, appl_email, appl_phone, motivation, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{applicantName}, #{applicantEmail}, #{applicantPhone}, #{motivation}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT va.apply_id AS application_id, va.member_id AS user_id, va.act_id AS activity_id, va.appl_name AS applicant_name, va.appl_email AS applicant_email, va.appl_phone AS applicant_phone, va.motivation, va.status, va.created_at, va.updated_at, vact.activity_name FROM vol_apply va LEFT JOIN volunteer_activities vact ON va.act_id = vact.activity_id WHERE va.apply_id = #{applicationId}

SELECT va.apply_id AS application_id, va.member_id AS user_id, va.act_id AS activity_id, va.appl_name AS applicant_name, va.appl_email AS applicant_email, va.appl_phone AS applicant_phone, va.motivation, va.status, va.created_at, va.updated_at, vact.activity_name FROM vol_apply va LEFT JOIN volunteer_activities vact ON va.act_id = vact.activity_id WHERE va.member_id = #{userId} ORDER BY va.created_at DESC

SELECT va.apply_id AS application_id, va.member_id AS user_id, va.act_id AS activity_id, va.appl_name AS applicant_name, va.appl_email AS applicant_email, va.appl_phone AS applicant_phone, va.motivation, va.status, va.created_at, va.updated_at, vact.activity_name FROM vol_apply va LEFT JOIN volunteer_activities vact ON va.act_id = vact.activity_id ORDER BY va.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE vol_apply SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE apply_id = #{applicationId}
